title: lets step away from stat stick items and start adding some more unique items
body:
Lets have an item that decreases the casting speed of basic spells and the active could affect ultimate abilities. This would add a whole different level of complexity to the game and way of thinking. Things that seemed too slow before and would cost you your life now could be used. The active could even shutdown the passive while its off CD. 

Things like this I could see could be super useful/useless/broken.

replies.body: Great idea. How about an item that gives you a buff when you ult that reduces the remaining CDs of your basic abilities by 20% with every auto? And heck, make it regenerate mana on crits, too! Wouldn't that be interesting and fun and viable and balanceable?
